title: Bloomberg Markets: Regnier on Equifax Data Heist

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Pat Regnier\u0010Editor of Markets & Finance\u0010Bloomberg Businessweek \u0010Discussing his Businessweek story on the Equifax data heist and what can be done about it.
